install.name: lknjoomlajobsregister
install.author: Instant Php
install.description: This plugin helps you to register your users as job seeker from default joomla registration form. do not forget to read the related document on instantphp.com

param.name: default_resume_title
param.label: Default Resume Title
param.description: Enter title for the default resume like Default Resume or Default or etc.

param.name: default_resume_status
param.label: Default Resume Status
param.description: Select the status of the dfeault resume. The default one is Unpublished

param.name: default_resume_language
param.label: Default Resume Language
param.description: Enter language for the resumes like English or French.
